channel.title: Authors on From Ordinary to Extraordinary using Super Simple, Super Easy Techniques

item.title: Manuj Chandra
item.description: Hi! I am Manuj Chandra, a self-taught Data Professional and a committed lifelong learner who is eager to translate my 15 plus years of passion for AI to solve contemporary challenges.

item.title: Sandeep Gandotra
item.description: Sandeep Gandotra is an experienced strategist, avid networker, entrepreneur and startup enthusiast with a passion for building businesses and relishing new challenges.
